feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Extensibility
feed.subtitle: SAP S/4HANA Cloud Extensibility Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Manage software collection which is exported by mistake with all items
entry.content:
Hi SAP Team,

User has exported software collection version with all items in it by mistake and got imported to Test system. This version has many items created by different users.

Only single item which consists in this software collection need to be moved to Production now and other items are not to be moved to production.

Please let us know how to manage this situation.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: Workflow condition for Purchase Order – How to read Plant at creation time in Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hello Everyone.

I am working in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud and have created a custom workflow for Purchase Orders in Manage Workflows for Purchase Orders.
The workflow has 2 steps and should be triggered only if the Plant = 1000.

I am implementing the BAdI SWF_WORKFLOW_CONDITION_DEF to define and evaluate a custom start condition.
In the EVALUATE_CONDITION method, I can easily check the Plant for an already saved PO using i_purchaseorderitemapi01.
Example:

SELECT * FROM i_purchaseorderitemapi01 WHERE purchaseorder = @IS_sap_object_node_type-sont_key_part_1 INTO TABLE @LT_items.

Problem:
When the PO is being created for the first time (in draft mode),

  • is_sap_object_node_type-sont_key_part_1 is empty (no PO number yet).

  • There is no CDS view like i_purchaseorderitemapidraft to read the plant directly.

  • So I cannot determine the plant at creation time to set cv_is_true for triggering the workflow.

Question:

  • How can I get the Plant information for a PO at the time of creation (before it has a PO number) inside SWF_WORKFLOW_CONDITION_DEF in S/4HANA Public Cloud?

  • Is there a draft table or API available for reading the data?


I found some other custom logic where I am getting plant data, but there I have no changing parameter which evaluates Workflow triggering condition. 

I found below 2 business context BADI definition & Implementation feasible for Workflow triggering.

SWF_WORKFLOW_CONDITION_DEF => Condition Definition
SWF_WORKFLOW_CONDITION_EVAL => Business Logic Validation
Except these I found no other feasible business context custom logic for workflow triggering.

How to achieve the above requirement
SAP S/4HANA Cloud ABAP Environment SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition

entry.title: How Can We Consume Standard APIs With Business Users in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud?
entry.content:
I'm currently working on an S/4HANA Public Cloud project and have a question regarding API consumption from a business user perspective.

I’m already familiar with the technical setup — using communication users, communication arrangements, and communication systems to consume standard APIs.

However, my current need is different:
Is there a way for a business user (not a communication/technical user) to access or consume SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud standard APIs?

entry.title: How to connect SAP Planon with S4HANA Public cloud with SAP Master Data Integration
entry.content:
Hello Team,

I want to connect SAP Planon with S/4HANA public cloud via Master Data Integration. Please share the exact SAP document or a video on this, so many people can benefit from it.

Thanks in advance.

Ahmed Ansari

entry.title: Export Software Collection in a Public Cloud environment fails after upgrade
entry.content:
I need to export one change to an BRF+ Application to our TST environment. I chose the option "CHANGED AND DELETED ITEMS". Due to the recent upgrade of Public Cloud to 2508, all items will be exported  

The export ends in an error message without extra information. It says 'Export Failed' but there is no detail information about why it failed. There are no other errors or warnings in the log. 

 

I have also tried to create a hotfix for the specific BRF+ change that I need to transport, but this hotfix has the same export error. 

I have also tried to activate the BRF+ application as a whole (mass change) again and then try to release but this also doesn't help.

I checked in Eclipse and found the Transport that was created by SAP.  If found this transportlog that maybe indicates that the lock cannot be set by SAP or that a lock is still active. 

 

How can I solve this problem? Is there a log somewhere that I can't see? What could be the issue?

Regards,

Ben Meijs

entry.title: Odata Create Material Document (S4 hana cloud public) error "content of order xxx, transferred.."
entry.content:
hi

context : we use the service API_MATERIAL_DOCUMENT_SRV from scenario Material Document Integration (SAP_COM_0108)

we want to create goods issue related to production order because we need to specify serial numbers used sometimes.

for now we juste try to create a simple material consumption with the following payload

<A_MaterialDocumentHeader>
	<A_MaterialDocumentHeaderType>
		<PostingDate>2025-08-19T20:00:00</PostingDate>
		<GoodsMovementCode>03</GoodsMovementCode>
		<CtrlPostgForExtWhseMgmtSyst>3</CtrlPostgForExtWhseMgmtSyst>
		<VersionForPrintingSlip>1</VersionForPrintingSlip>
		<to_MaterialDocumentItem>
			<A_MaterialDocumentItemType>
				<Material>PLAQNU_APS</Material>
				<Plant>3010</Plant>
				<StorageLocation>FR10</StorageLocation>
				<GoodsMovementType>261</GoodsMovementType>
				<MaterialDocumentItemText>TEST</MaterialDocumentItemText>
				<ManufacturingOrder>1000404</ManufacturingOrder>
				<ManufacturingOrderItem>1</ManufacturingOrderItem>
				<EWMWarehouse>110</EWMWarehouse>
				<EWMStorageBin>PROD-SUPPLY</EWMStorageBin>
				<GoodsMovementRefDocType>F</GoodsMovementRefDocType>
				<QuantityInEntryUnit>1.25</QuantityInEntryUnit>
				<EntryUnit>M2</EntryUnit>
				<Reservation>617</Reservation>
				<ReservationItem>1</ReservationItem>
			</A_MaterialDocumentItemType>
		</to_MaterialDocumentItem>
	</A_MaterialDocumentHeaderType>
</A_MaterialDocumentHeader>

but we get the error 

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<error xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/ado/2007/08/dataservices/metadata">
	<code>M7/349</code>
	<message xml:lang="en">Content of order 1000404: PLAQUS_APS transferred to interface (IMSEG): PLAQNU_APS</message>
	<innererror>
		<application>
			<component_id>MM-IM-VDM-SGM</component_id>
			<service_namespace>/SAP/</service_namespace>
			<service_id>API_MATERIAL_DOCUMENT_SRV</service_id>
			<service_version>0001</service_version>
		</application>
		<transactionid>f5956f988f884dc59fc90a5ee55b8cd0</transactionid>
		<timestamp>20250819105118.9045300</timestamp>
		<Error_Resolution>
			<SAP_Transaction>For backend administrators: use ADT feed reader "SAP Gateway Error Log" or run transaction /IWFND/ERROR_LOG on SAP Gateway hub system and search for entries with the timestamp above for more details</SAP_Transaction>
			<SAP_Note>See SAP Note 1797736 for error analysis (https://service.sap.com/sap/support/notes/1797736)</SAP_Note>
		</Error_Resolution>
		<errordetails>
			<errordetail>
				<ContentID/>
				<code>M7/349</code>
				<message>Content of order 1000404: PLAQUS_APS transferred to interface (IMSEG): PLAQNU_APS</message>
				<longtext_url>/sap/opu/odata/iwbep/message_text;o=LOCAL/T100_longtexts(MSGID='M7',MSGNO='349',MESSAGE_V1='1000404',MESSAGE_V2='PLAQUS_APS',MESSAGE_V3='PLAQNU_APS',MESSAGE_V4='')/$value</longtext_url>
				<propertyref/>
				<severity>error</severity>
				<target/>
				<transition>false</transition>
			</errordetail>
		</errordetails>
	</innererror>
</error>

we tried several options and fields without success. we had no problem to create a good receipt for the same production order, but the consumption of components is not working...

this is what our production order looks like when it is sent for manufacturing : 

<n0:ManufacturingOrderExecuteRequest_V2 xmlns:n0="http://sap.com/xi/SAPGlobal20/Global" xmlns:soap-env="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:prx="urn:sap.com:proxy:KLX:/1SAI/TAE785CF53A5441736BC90D:916" xmlns:n1="http://sap.com/xi/PP/Global2">
	<MessageHeader>
		<ID>FA163E0211241FE09F9CB919D4FCC91A</ID>
		<UUID>fa163e02-1124-1fe0-9f9c-b919d4fcc91a</UUID>
		<CreationDateTime>2025-08-19T10:18:00.875Z</CreationDateTime>
		<SenderBusinessSystemID>0M628UP</SenderBusinessSystemID>
	</MessageHeader>
	<ManufacturingOrder changeOrdinalNumberValue="1" reconciliationPeriodCounterValue="1">
		<ManufacturingOrder>1000404</ManufacturingOrder>
		<ManufacturingOrderCategory>10</ManufacturingOrderCategory>
		<ManufacturingOrderType>YBM1</ManufacturingOrderType>
		<ProductionPlant>3010</ProductionPlant>
		<Material>PLAQUS_APS</Material>
		<BillOfMaterialCategory>M</BillOfMaterialCategory>

	</ManufacturingOrder>
</n0:ManufacturingOrderExecuteRequest_V2>

 

anyone can help?  thanks

entry.title: 在eclipse中使用ADT插件做RAP开发报表使用https调用odata接口遇到报错"Selection is empty. Processing is canceled!"
entry.content:
Dear SAP expert,

我们在eclipse中使用ADT插件做RAP开发报表时，数据没有合适的CDS，但是有对应的API：API_MRP_MATERIALS_SRV_01/SupplyDemandItems ，此API在使用postman测试时加上参数（?$filter=Material eq '******' and MRPPlant eq '****' and PeriodType eq '*'）就能得到想要的数据，在RAP代码中使用https调用odata接口会遇到报错：Selection is empty. Processing is canceled! ， 这是因为接口没有读取到我设置的参数，无论是使用set_form_field还是使用set_query都无法设置有效的参数，是否还有其他设置参数的方法，或者有https的其他类可以使用。

代码：

DATA: http_client TYPE REF TO if_web_http_client,

lo_response TYPE REF TO if_web_http_response,

lv_url type string,

lv_usename type string,

lv_pwd type string.

 

" 通过 URL 启用通信

DATA(lo_url_destination) = cl_http_destination_provider=>create_by_url(

lv_url ).

 

" 获取 请求的 client

http_client = cl_web_http_client_manager=>create_by_http_destination( lo_url_destination ).

 

DATA(req) = http_client->get_http_request( ).

 

"设置账号密码

req->set_authorization_basic( i_username = lv_usename i_password = lv_pwd ).

"设置参数

req->set_form_field( i_name = 'Material' i_value = '00698-321/0000' ).

req->set_form_field( i_name = 'MRPPlant' i_value = '8900' ).

req->set_form_field( i_name = 'PeriodType' i_value = '2' ).

req->set_header_field( i_name = 'Accept' i_value = 'application/json' ).

"执行查询方法

lo_response = http_client->execute( if_web_http_client=>get ).

"获取返回数据 （报错：Selection is empty. Processing is canceled!）

DATA(lv_random_value) = lo_response->get_text( ).

 

DATA lt_response TYPE ty_response.

 

/ui2/cl_json=>deserialize(

EXPORTING json = lv_random_value

CHANGING data = lt_response )

 

Best regards,

Joey

entry.title: Custom Fiori Application in 2SL System
entry.content:
Hi SAP Experts,

We are currently working on the SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Edition (2-System Landscape – 2SL), and we are exploring the possibility of developing custom UI5Fiori applications.

Could you please guide us on the best practices or available approaches for developing and deploying custom UI5 Fiori applications to the S4HANA 2SL system

Thanks in Advance

Regards,

Sai Bhargav

entry.title: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud : Setup Client ID/Secret, User ID and Password in Communication Arrangement
entry.content:
Hi Expert,

I am trying to implement the communication arrangement for a third-party REST API with their given user ID/password along with client ID and client secret. There is no as such IDP certificate from a third-party system that I can upload to Handshake with the SAP S/4HANA public cloud system. So I need to pass their user ID and password along with the client ID and secret. So my question is, where can I maintain these parameters, and how can I use it in SAP ABAP to establish the communication to call the REST API?

Note: When I do the same setup in Postman (with the user ID, password, client ID, and client secret), it generates the bearer token with one of the REST APIs, and I pass the generated bearer token to the second API call to send the data. I am trying to achieve similar functionality through communication arrangement and with ABAP code.

I highly appreciate the input and thank you in advance.

Regards,
Yasho.

entry.title: Help creating a Data Provider for Forms created in ADT in S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508
entry.content:
Hi,

As part of S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508, I noticed we are now allowed to create forms using ADT in DEV Tenant.

I was able to upload a custom Layout, but when I press the Data Provider nothing is shown, not Custom Data Providers, not Standard Data Providers:

I searched for documentation about Forms created in ADT and found the following link Creating Forms | SAP Help Portal

but it doesn't explain how to create data providers for this specific forms.

Does anyone know if there's an official documentation from SAP explaining what are the rules to create Data Providers for ADT Forms?

Thanks in advance.

entry.title: S/4HANA Public Cloud 2502: Custom tile for Custom UI5 application with parameters
entry.content:
Dear SAP experts,

I have an issue with the Fiori app Display Line Item Entry (F2218) , which does not accept the URL parameters "P_FromPostingDate" and "P_ToPostingDate".

In on-premise systems I was able to solve this by creating a new tile as a copy of the standard one and adding the required parameters.

The problem is that in S/4HANA Public Cloud there is no SAP Fiori Launchpad Designer, so I cannot create a new tile in this way.

I used the following reference to create a Custom Tile, but this only works for external applications and does not allow me to add new parameters.

¿How can I create a tile with parameters in S/4HANA Public Cloud 2502?

Thank you very much.

Best regards,

entry.title: Currency Exchange rates- SAP S/4 HANA Public cloud integration.
entry.content:
Dear Members,

I need to capture daily currency exchange rates and post them to the Currency Exchange Rate app through SAP CPI integration.

Thanks.

entry.title: Manage Withholding Tax Items Peru – Issue with Reporting Date not moving to correct Fiscal Period
entry.content:
Hi Experts,

I am using the app Manage Withholding Tax Items for Peru Localization to change the Withholding Tax Reporting Date from 01.07.2025 to 21.08.2025 for a supplier invoice (1300000010) that has a WHT type at invoice posting.

I tried the following options:

  • Exclude option:
    When I run the report for Period August (01.08.2025–31.08.2025) and set the Reporting Date 01.08.2025–31.08.2025 as a parameter, the invoice does not appear.

    When I run the report for Period July (01.07.2025–31.07.2025) with Reporting Date 01.07.2025–31.07.2025, the invoice appears, but the Tax Period is 202508.

  • Holding option:
    When I run the report again for Period July with the same parameters, the invoice appears, but the Tax Period is 999912, which should not be correct.

  • Include option:
    I tried to include the invoice in Period August, but the invoice still does not appear in that period.

I have reviewed the Help Portal, and it seems that the app is not working as expected, since it does not move the invoice to the correct reporting period.

Thanks in advance for your support!

SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Service SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Extensibility Localization

entry.title: Configure Value Mapping. APP eDocument for a non-localized country CE2508

entry.title: CDS View to tell us if a specific date falls on a public holiday
entry.content:
Hi Community

We would like to build a view that joins with I_CalendarDate that helps us determining if a date is a working date. So basically Monday til Friday are working days this is easy. But it also should take in account the holidays (including public holidays) that are defined in the factory calendar.

Is such a view available?

Thanks

Thomas

entry.title: Duplicates in draft on test tenant - public cloud
entry.content:
Hi community,

I have created a managed with draft application in the public cloud. ( list report )
I tested it on the dev tenant and then transported it to the test tenant.
The testing on the dev tenant were without errors.
On the test tenant I'm encoutering the following error:
All items that i create, get the same draft uuid. Meaning once i press go I see no data as I get a duplicate error message or if I continue with the create message, i get an page error as again, my table contains duplicates.

Duplicate error:
Failed to get contexts for /sap/opu/odata4/sap/z_billing/srvd/sap/z_billing/0001/Billinginfo with start index 0 and length 30 - Error: Duplicate key predicate: (ParentId=fa163e0b-7372-1fe0-a0fd-9f1480095443,IsActiveEntity=false)

If I look into my odata response with the dev tools, I can see all my created items, still in draft mode, with a non unique draft uuid.

I'm thinking about trying out late numbering to fix the issue, but I don't understand why the issue happens in the first place.
It works fine on the dev system.

a)Any suggestions ?

Further cloud questions related to this issue.
b)How can i delete data from my draft table from the test tenant ?
  Do i need to call an api service that can delete data or build a data managing app ?
c)If I'm not mistaken, it is not possible to look into the databases on the test tenant, correct ?

Kind regards
JT

entry.title: Error creating transport request ERP public cloud
entry.content:
Hi Community!

I attempted to create a new, transportable package outside of the ZLOCAL component. However, the system still produces an error when I try to create the transportation.

I suspect the root cause may not be just the package type, but the extension methodology itself. My understanding is that for S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, classic extensions (like creating an ENHO object from Eclipse) are not permitted in order to maintain a "Clean Core." Instead, the recommended approach is to use the "Custom Logic" Fiori app to implement BAdIs that SAP has explicitly released for the cloud.

 

My specific question is: Is the BADI_WHT BAdI enabled for extension via Eclipse ADT in our public cloud environment, or is it mandatory that we find an alternative, released BAdI within the "Custom Logic" app?

 

I am attaching screenshots of the new error I receive when using the transportable package.

 

I appreciate your guidance in ensuring we are using the correct extensibility method for our platform.

 

Best regards,

 

Diana
I only have ZLOCAL and Z001 for superpackage

more information (my question):
https://community.sap.com/t5/technology-q-a/error-creating-badi-enhancement-implementation-quot-sap-object-enhs-cannot/qaq-p/14195538 

BaDI: https://api.sap.com/badi/BADI_FIBRREI_WHT

entry.title: Interfaces IF_EDOC_SOURCE_EXTENSION & IF_EDOC_SOURCE_PROCESS_EXT for DRC in SAP Public Cloud
entry.content:
Objective:

To manually create eDocument for CLM invoices in eDocument Cockpit as it’s not supported, and Relevant indicator is set to false. Therefore, we want to manipulate the Relevant indicator through standard interfaces; IF_EDOC_SOURCE_EXTENSION and IF_EDOC_SOURCE_PROCESS_EXT. These interfaces are provided by SAP in document- Enabling a Source Type for a Process | SAP Help Portal.

Please note that, testing is done in Customizing Demo but actual Customizing system screenshots are just for reference.

Problem:

1) Source Ext. Active checkbox is not available in SSCUI ID 102190 - Activate Source Type Documents for Company Code (pre-requisite 4).

2) Standard class CL_EDOCUMENT which is also used to generate the XML is not released (pre-requisite 1).

3) The extension classes have been created and all pre-requisites for these interfaces, but they’re not called/triggered (probably bcus of problem 1).

 

Question:

1) Is there a configuration to enable the column “Source Ext. Active”?

2) Since it’s a standard object, does this need to be released as well for the extension to work?

3) At which point will the standard process call below methods, or did we miss something?
    a) IF_EDOC_SOURCE_EXTENSION~IS_RELEVANT

    b) IF_EDOC_SOURCE_PROCESS_EXT~ CHECK_RELEVANCE

 

These are all the 4 pre-requisites that are identified based on the documentation.

NOTE: Pre-requisites 1 and 4 are not met due to standard error.

1) The development objects needed to generate XML are already released except for CL_EDOCUMENT which is the standard object.

CL_EDOCUMENT in both Customizing (Actual & Demo) systems are not released yet:

But for custom extension classes for IF_EDOC_SOURCE_EXTENSION & IF_EDOC_SOURCE_PROCESS_EXT they have been set to release:

NOTE: For testing purpose, we maintained both FI_INVOICE, RE_INVOICE & RE_DOC:

2) The source extension class has been implemented for the interface IF_EDOC_SOURCE_EXTENSION:

3) The source process extension class has implemented for the interface IF_EDOC_SOURCE_PROCESS_EXT.

The edoc_Process is MYINV as it’s part of the Customer Invoice.

4) The combination of company code and source type have been set to Active and you've selected the Active and Source Ext. Active:
